description: Enhance your PC for ultimate data management with this All-in-One MultiFunction Front Panel Card Reader! This 3.5-inch unit easily fits into your computer's front drive bay, and all that's required to install is simply connecting the attached USB header to your motherboard. This memory card reader supports all types of formats - from CompactFlash, Secure Digital, MultiMedia Card, MicroDrive, XD, to Memory Stick. Oh, the options!Integrate this 3.5-inch All-in-One MultiFunction Card Reader into your computer today!
title: 3.5" USB 2.0 All-in-One MultiFunction Internal Card Reader
